Introduction

Huang Ren Jun is a Chinese singer based in South Korea. Renjun is best known as a member of the boy group NCT and the Main Vocalist and Lead Dancer of its sub-group NCT Dream.

Born in Jilin, China on March 23rd, 2000, Renjun has always been interested in performing. Before debuting, Renjun used to study ballet and contemporary dance.

On April 13, 2024, SM Entertainment announced that Renjun recently experienced a "worsening of his physical health" and symptoms of anxiety. As a result, his activities with NCT DREAM would be suspended for the time being to receive sufficient rest and stability. On April 20, SM Entertainment announced that Renjun would go on a temporary hiatus from all activities to focus on treatment and recovery.
